action.description: The committee on PBS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Iwamoto, Ichiyama, Lamosao, Poepoe, Shimizu, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem, Morikawa, Woodson.
